docs.lead_paragraph: READERS will find printed below lists at the contents of the principal American magazines for July. The lists are restricted to periodicals which appear once a month; and while the contents are not absolutely complete, the omissions relate mainly to regular and familiar departments and some of the minor contributions.

headline.main: THE MAGAZINES.; Features of the Principal American Ones for July.
